problem:
theory AddSuccR
  imports Main
begin

datatype mynat = MyZero ("0") | MySuc mynat

fun myadd :: "mynat \<Rightarrow> mynat \<Rightarrow> mynat" where
  "myadd MyZero m = m" |
  "myadd (MySuc n) m = MySuc (myadd n m)"

lemma add_succ_r: "myadd n (MySuc m) = MySuc (myadd n m)"
(* Fill Your Proof Here *)
end
